channel.title: Bank Error
channel.description:
I have a problem with blood runes, you can't withdraw them from the bank or it crashes the server. So, to fix that, I decided to try to make it impossible to withdraw them.
So I put this at the top of my [code]public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {[/code] to try and fix it. [code]if (itemID != 565){[/code] then I have all the bank code, and at the bottem I have this [code]}else{ sendMessage("You cannot withdraw this rune, just go get more."); }[/code] and It doesn't work
I get this error while compiling: [code]---------------------- --Initiating Compile-- ---------------------- client.java:14323: illegal start of type }else{ ^ 1 error ---------------------- --Compiling complete-- ---------------------- [/code]
Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Bank Error
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

[quote=“Monkey wacko, post:6, topic:117357”]Ive replaced my bloods in all my servers with ectos and they work great!

Search:

hasset = 1;

Below the } add:

ReplaceItems(565, 4278); // Pwnm30rdi3: Replaces blood runes with ectos

the most server have that…
and that is from Xerozcheez.

That’s actually not a bad method, because it will stop crashes… Try putting

}else{ sendMessage("You cannot withdraw this rune, just go get more."); }

in different spots around the Bank void?

item.title: Bank Error
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

I have a problem with blood runes, you can’t withdraw them from the bank or it crashes the server. So, to fix that, I decided to try to make it impossible to withdraw them.

So I put this at the top of my public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { to try and fix it.

if (itemID != 565){ then I have all the bank code, and at the bottem I have this }else{ sendMessage("You cannot withdraw this rune, just go get more."); } and It doesn’t work

I get this error while compiling:

[code]----------------------
–Initiating Compile–

client.java:14323: illegal start of type
}else{
^
1 error

–Compiling complete–

[/code]

Anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
